entry.name: autoRestore
entry.label: Automatically restore minimized windows once enough space is available again

entry.name: ignoreNonnormal
entry.label: Permit overlap with any non-normal windows

entry.name: ignoreTransient
entry.label: Permit overlap with transient windows belonging to the toplevel window such as dialogs and toolbars

entry.name: ignoreSpecial
entry.label: Permit overlap with special windows such as panel popouts or KRunner

entry.name: excludeMode
entry.label: Whether to gap all except the specified applications

entry.name: includeMode
entry.label: Whether to gap no except the specified applications

entry.name: excludedAppsForeground
entry.label: List of applications to be excluded as foreground windows

entry.name: excludedAppsBackground
entry.label: List of applications to be excluded as background windows

entry.name: includedAppsForeground
entry.label: List of applications to be included as foreground windows

entry.name: includedAppsBackground
entry.label: List of applications to be included as background windows
